definition[0]: if two or more people get along, they have a friendly relationship
example[0]: We’ve always got along quite well.
example[1]: They seem to get along with each other.
definition[1]: to deal with a job or situation or to make progress
example[2]: How’s Sam getting along at university?
example[3]: Don’t worry, we’ll get along without you.
definition[2]: used to say that it is time for you to leave, for example because you have something else to do
